sentences.sContent: Earth’s biggest advantage comes from having plate tectonics that stabilize the amount of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere that keeps Earth warm.
sentences.sContent_eng: Earth’s biggest advantage comes from having plate tectonics that stabilize the amount of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere that keeps Earth warm.
sentences.sCn: 地球最大的优点在于板块构造，这些构造能够平衡大气层中二氧化碳的数量，使地球保持温暖。

remMethod.val: tect(遮蔽) + on + ics → 被地球表面遮蔽的 → 地质构造

words.tran: [地质] 构造的；建筑的；地壳构造上的

trans.tranCn: [建] 构造学，[地质] 构造地质学
